app.containers.HomePage.title: Peeranha - Decentralized Q&A website with crypto rewards
app.containers.HomePage.description: Decentralized questions and answers website that rewards users with crypto tokens for their contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.weAreDecentraliz: Decentralized website with questions and answers that rewards users with crypto tokens for their contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.differentThan: Peeranha is more than a Q&A website.
app.containers.HomePage.differentThan2: It is a community that puts users at the heart by:
app.containers.HomePage.peopleSaveHours: On daily basis, millions of people save hundreds of hours through knowledge of others on Q&A websites. Peeranha’s users are rewarded with PEER crypto tokens for valuable contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.peeranhaDecentra: Peeranha is completely permissionless and decentralized. Website governance is created for the community, by the community. Peeranha puts power in the hands of the contributors, not the developers.
app.containers.HomePage.peeranhaPhilosop: Peeranha’s philosophy is to reward early users generously for their time. As the website grows, rewards will even out and be distributed to more members of the community.
app.containers.HomePage.askQuestionAndGe: Peeranha has passionate experts from all areas of life that are ready to help others. Users can return the favor by helping thousands of others answer questions they may also have. Users can get the answers to their questions in a matter of minutes.
app.containers.HomePage.helpCommunity: Experts contribute to the community by answering questions from their peers. Answers not only help the person who asked the question but thousands of others who have similar questions. Once a question has been answered, the knowledge can be shared with current and future users.
app.containers.HomePage.getPaidInCryptoF: A weekly pool of reward tokens is distributed to users for their contributions. Contributions consist of posting and answering questions. Reward tokens can be sold on the open market to anyone wanting to pay for content to be placed on the platform. An example of paid content can be product advertisements or job openings. Users are always rewarded for their valuable contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.whetherYouAsk: As users build their level of contributions, they also improve their reputation. The community recognizes valuable contributors that answer questions for others. Earning a high reputation unlocks privileges and the user’s standing within the community increases!
app.containers.HomePage.participateInMod: Governing the community is in the hands of its members. The best decisions for the platform result in higher token values. Through the governance structure built into Peeranha, the website is moderated by its users. As a decentralized, open source project, the future is decided by the user. Much like a local community, your voice matters.
app.containers.HomePage.beTheFirst: Joining early means enjoying higher levels of rewards
app.containers.HomePage.rewardsPool: Rewards are distributed weekly to all contributors.  As the number of weekly contributors goes up, rewards per user decrease over time. Joining early means enjoying higher levels of rewards for your pioneering contributions to an early community.
app.containers.HomePage.weAppreciate: We highly appreciate your feedback, opinions or suggestion for the platform. Send us few lines or even better let us know if you have 15 minutes to chat.
app.containers.HomePage.sergeyIlinDescri: Developer and architect with over decade of experience building software from websites to large scale enterprise solutions for Fortune 500 companies. Passionate about finding groundbreaking practical applications of Blockchain technology.
app.containers.HomePage.nikitaSyrDescrip: Blockchain app technician, interested in solving different problems and learning new technologies. I believe that any problem can be solved with the right approach.
app.containers.HomePage.romRemDescriptio: Based in Minsk front-end developer, currently focused on data-management and User Experience in decentralized applications.
app.containers.HomePage.ulyanaPopovaDesc: Ready to produce wire-frames, mock-ups, and prototypes which help implement the modernization of systems with an effective, efficient, aesthetic and uncluttered user experience. Able to use humor and energy to keep the momentum going.
app.containers.HomePage.olgaFyodorovaDes: Strong communication skills regardless of the audience and is able interact effectively with a wide range of people, executives, staff, suppliers, colleagues and applicants.
app.containers.HomePage.steveKreyninDesc: Successful serial entrepreneur, CEO of Forte Group, an international IT Consulting Company.
app.containers.HomePage.subject: Subject
app.containers.HomePage.platformUnderDev: Website is currently under development. Sign up for notifications to be one of the first to join and earn higher rewards as an early adopter.

app.containers.SignUp.firstParagraphAlmo: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It’s powered by blockchain.
app.containers.SignUp.secondParagraphAlm: Telos blockchain account is required to use Peeranha. A fee is required to create an account.
app.containers.SignUp.thirdParagraphAlmo: We're happy to cover this fee for you but we'll need your email and phone number to manually check that you're a real person. This process could take 1-2 weeks.
app.containers.SignUp.weWillNotify: We will notify you when your account will be ready. Usually it takes no longer than 4 hours.
app.containers.SignUp.theWayBlockchainAc: We are creating a blockchain account for you to interact with the platform. Only you will have access to the private key for the account. Our service will be authorized to post a limited set of actions on the platform on behalf of your account in order to provide you with a convenient experience. You'll be able to revoke that permission of service account at any time.
app.containers.SignUp.dontWorryAboutBloc: Sounds too complicated? Don’t worry! Just remember to write down your Secret Phrase and save it in a safe place. Secret Phrase is the only way to access your blockchain account and the rewards that you'll earn. We will guide you when it is time to use your Secret Phrase to withdraw the rewards.
app.containers.SignUp.peeranhaIsNotTypic: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It’s powered by blockchain.
app.containers.SignUp.telosBlockchainPow: Telos blockchain powers many decentralized applications like Peeranha, which is run by community members all around the world. Telos blockchain account is required to use these applications.
app.containers.SignUp.weAreHappyToCover: If you prefer to use a wallet application to manage your blockchain account, then wallet sign up option is available.
app.containers.SignUp.ifYouLikeToSkip: New to blockchain? Do not worry! You will be able to access Peeranha using your email address and password as any other website.
app.containers.SignUp.doYouHaveAlreadyAc: Do you already have an account?
app.containers.SignUp.youHaveToSaveKeys: Secret Phrase is the only way to access your blockchain account and rewards that you'll earn! Write your Secret Phrase on a piece of paper and store it in a secure location. Alternatively, store your Secret Phrase in a password manager like 1Password.
app.containers.SignUp.title: Registration
app.containers.SignUp.iSaveSecretPhrase: I saved Secret Phrase in a safe place. I understand that Secret Phrase is the only way to access my blockchain account and rewards.
app.containers.SignUp.userAlreadyRegiste: User with such identity has been already registered
app.containers.SignUp.keysDoNotMatch: Private keys do not match Telos account name
app.containers.SignUp.registrationWithEo: Registration is successfully passed. Now you can login and continue work in our app!
